Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.TextUtil.DEFAULT_CHARSET
    as of 2.26, use StandardCharsets.ISO_8859_1
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.xml.XmlUtil.DEFAULT_CHARSET
    as of 2.26, use StandardCharsets.UTF_8
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlInput.click(int, int)
    as of 2.25, please use DomElement.click()
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlImageInput.click(int, int)
    as of 2.25, please use HtmlImageInput.click()
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.ScriptElement.getCharset()
    as of 2.27, not used
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlScript.getCharset()
    as of 2.27, not used
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.svg.SvgScript.getCharset()
    as of 2.27, not used
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlImage.getComplete()
    as of 2.26, please use HtmlImage.isComplete() instead
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebResponse.getContentAsString(String)
    as of 2.25, please use WebResponse.getContentAsString(Charset) instead
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.util.WebResponseWrapper.getContentAsString(String)
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebResponse.getContentAsString(String, String)
    as of 2.25, please use WebResponse.getContentAsString(Charset) instead
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.util.WebResponseWrapper.getContentAsString(String, String)
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.SgmlPage.getPageEncoding()
    as of 2.25, please use SgmlPage.getCharset() instead
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebClientOptions.getPrintContentOnFailingStatusCode()
    as of 2.27, please use WebClientOptions.isPrintContentOnFailingStatusCode()
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebRequest.setCharset(String)
    as of 2.25, please use WebRequest.setCharset(Charset)
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.html.HtmlFileInput.setValueAttribute(String[])
    as of 2.25, please use HtmlFileInput.setFiles(File...) instead
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.StringWebResponse(String, String, URL)
    as of 2.25, please use StringWebResponse.StringWebResponse(String, Charset, URL)
